original_title: Captain Maya and the Space Explorers
overview: Nick and Taffy are on a fun-filled mission through outer space, absorbing all the facts they can, and enjoying every minute of it! And when the esteemed Professor Mucus joins them via satellite, the learning kicks into warp speed! Join the Space Explorers on a fun and educational adventure for kids and grown ups alike!
title: Captain Maya and the Space Explorers
